逐.definition: (bound form) to pursue; to chase away; individually; one by one

逐個.definition: one by one; one after another

逐出.definition: to expel; to evict; to drive out

逐夢.definition: to chase a dream; to pursue one's dreams

逐字逐句.definition: literal; word for word; word by word and phrase by phrase

逐客令.definition: the First Emperor's order to expel foreigners; (fig.) notice to leave; words or behavior intended at turning visitors out

逐年.definition: year after year; with each passing year; over the years

逐日.definition: day-by-day; daily; on a daily basis

逐月.definition: month-by-month; monthly; on a monthly basis

逐次.definition: gradually; one after another; little by little

逐水.definition: to relieve oedema through purging or diuresis (Chinese medicine)

逐行掃描.definition: line by line scanning; progressive scanning

逐走.definition: to turn away; to drive away

逐鹿.definition: to pursue deer; fig. to vie for supremacy

逐鹿中原.definition: lit. hunting deer in the Central Plain (idiom); fig. to attempt to seize the throne
